item.description:
I've seen trailers for this movie, and it looks like a funny romantic comedy. Stars Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, and Chris Tucker. Directed by David O. Russell (Three Kings, The Fighter).

Summary (from IMDb): After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat (Bradley Cooper) moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, (Jennifer Lawrence) a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

A few people have pointed out that this film is only playing at the AMC 16 in Framingham. I wanted to go to Blackstone, but Framingham is the only option. Since 19 have signed up, let's meet at 7:00 for the 7:45 PM show. Feel free to call or text my cell phone at 508-981-0455 if you need to reach me.

Anyone who wants to can join me for food and drinks afterwards.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet outside the theater. I look like my photo.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Silver Linings Playbook
